Name: RedMax
Natural: The RedMax TRZ230S Trimmer features a 22.5cc Strato-Charged engine for 20% better fuel economy, a steel drive shaft for durability, and lightweight portability, ideal for homeowners and professional landscapers.

Name: Toro
Natural: The Toro 60V Flex-Force String Trimmer offers a 13" to 15" adjustable cut width, brushless motor with RunSmart® intel, and up to 45 minutes of runtime, perfect for users seeking flexible, powerful battery performance.

Name: Honda
Natural: The Honda HHT35SLTA Trimmer combines a 35cc 4-stroke engine with 17" cutting width, Ultra Quiet® line, and high torque, designed for heavy-duty trimming and brush removal with superior comfort and fuel efficiency.

Name: CRAFTSMAN
Natural: The CRAFTSMAN V20 String Trimmer features a brushless motor, 11–13" adjustable swath, WeatherGuard™ technology, and up to 75 minutes runtime, ideal for users wanting compact, cordless convenience with durable performance.

Name: Makita
Natural: The Makita 36V (18V X2) LXT Brushless String Trimmer delivers high torque, direct-drive performance, Star Protection tech, and XPT weather-resistance, built for landscapers seeking cordless alternatives to gas models.

Name: DeWalt
Natural: The DeWalt 20V MAX Cordless String Trimmer features a gear drive transmission for high torque, 13" cutting swath, and variable speed trigger, offering efficient, powerful trimming within the 20V MAX battery system.

Name: BLACK+DECKER
Natural: The BLACK+DECKER 20V MAX String Trimmer/Edger features Automatic Feed Spool, easy height adjustment, and quick conversion between trimming and edging, making it ideal for lightweight, flexible lawn care.

Name: Husqvarna
Natural: The Husqvarna 122C Gas String Trimmer offers a 22cc engine with Smart Start® technology, ergonomic curved shaft, 17" cutting width, and Tap'n Go line feed, perfect for homeowners needing easy-to-use, low-noise trimming.
